title: Cloud 3C Awarded NECs Diamond Status Second Time in a Row
text:
Cloud 3C Awarded NECs Diamond Status Second Time in a Row
Orlando, FL, August 26, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Cloud 3C, a Voice, Video & Data Technology organization that focuses on Future-Proofing End-user Communications for both on premise customer equipment (CPE) and Hosted Cloud Services has been awarded “Diamond” status by NEC Corporation of America in their Accelerator Program. This acknowledgement is in recognition of maintaining high business standards and sales achievement.
“We are happy to be acknowledged by NEC for the second year in a row for our business standards and achievements, it is a testament to our employees always striving for excellence in customer service and product knowledge,” stated Beth Caffera, CEO of Cloud 3C. NEC is a leader in cutting edge communication technology and continuously endeavoring to engineer the best of class in the market.
The Accelerator Program is NEC’s performance-based program for Business Associates based on several key metrics; including sales volume, technical certifications and percentage of NEC solutions being sold in their business. By participating in this program, associates have access to innovative communication solutions as well as exclusive benefits and awards. Recognizing NEC dealers that achieve Diamond status lets customers know the Business Associate is committed to maintaining exemplary product knowledge when designing, deploying and maintaining customer networks.
Co-Founder, Chris Caffera, VP of Business Development and Vendor Relations at Cloud 3C, expresses “our firm’s philosophy is one of educating the client on all that Cloud 3C sells and supports to insure they receive the highest level of success in every implementation.” Additionally, “Our Business Partnership with NEC grows continuously,” Chris explained. “Their technology is an integral part of everyday sales and support at Cloud 3C.”

About NEC of America
NEC Corporation of America is a leading technology provider of strategic IT and communications solutions. Serving carrier, small-to-medium business and large enterprise clients across multiple vertical industries, NEC Corporation of America provides its customers greater access to a rich portfolio of technology and professional services, enhanced opportunities and competitive solutions.
NEC's brand statement, "Empowered by Innovation," expresses commitment to empowering people and society through continuous innovation in every area of our businesses, fueled by infinite passion for innovation and our customer-focused spirit of collaboration. For more information, please visit www.nec.com.
About Cloud 3C
Cloud 3C is an expert in business communication systems that use the Internet as a convenient, reliable channel for phone, data and videoconferencing services. Our consultative approach alleviates technology investment anxiety and ensures that your future-proof communication system improves efficiency, reduces costs and grows with your company. Highly certified and experienced technicians deliver a range of solutions from installing network infrastructure and IP phones on site to providing hassle-free hosted and managed services for VoIP calling, Wi-Fi business software, security services, email and more. For more information, please visit www.cloud3c.com.
